title: WanderLust
description: Discover and share stays worth remembering. Wanderlust lets users explore curated property listings and leave reviews to help fellow travelers. Built with a focus on simplicity, usability, and experience-driven content.

title: TradeX
description: A sleek and intuitive stock trading platform simulation that mirrors real-world trading dashboards. It features live-style charts, portfolio insights, and a clean UI that offers a seamless experience for market enthusiasts.
